page.title: 13HOMELIFE.
page.content: {Family. }Most have two or three children.{ {The Home.}Majority of houses are now modernised, have Mains Eleectricity and cook,are heated by and have water heated by either electricity, Calor or mains gas,oil,wood,coal or smokeless fuel. The four latter burned either in cookers,stoves or on open fires. {Kitchen}mainly fitted, containing cooker, washing machine, refrigerator, freezer,sink and some a dishwasher. {Relaxation.}Every home has at least one other room mostly with Television and other Audio Visual Equipment. {Meals.}Usually 3 meals a day,are taken with the main meal taken in the evening or less often at Middday. {Toilet Facilities. }Most homes have a bathroom with toilet, washbasin, bath & shower with hot & cold runnung water.{
